SAMRAI::hier::BoxNeighborhoodCollection::ConstNeighborIterator

SAMRAI::hier::BoxNeighborhoodCollection::ConstNeighborIterator Class Reference

An iterator over the neighbors in the neighborhood of a base Box in a const BoxNeighborhoodCollection. The interface does not allow modification of the neighbors. More...

Friends

class BoxNeighborhoodCollection

Detailed Description

An iterator over the neighbors in the neighborhood of a base Box in a const BoxNeighborhoodCollection. The interface does not allow modification of the neighbors.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

SAMRAI::hier::BoxNeighborhoodCollection::ConstNeighborIterator::ConstNeighborIterator ( const ConstIterator &  base_box_itr,
bool  from_start = true 
)

Constructs an iterator over the neighbors of the base Box pointed to by the supplied Iterator in the supplied collection of neighborhoods.

Parameters:
base_box_itr 
from_start If true constructs an iterator pointing to the first neighbor. Otherwise constructs an iterator pointing one past the last neighbor.
